md:
giải nghĩa từ "furniture" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Furniture (n) - Đồ nội thất
	* Furniture refers to movable objects intended to provide comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal in a home, office, or other space.
	* Ví dụ: "The furniture in the living room was modern and stylish."
	* Từ liên quan: chair, table, bed, sofa, desk, cabinet...

2. Furniture (v) - Trang bị đồ nội thất
	* To furnish a room or building means to provide it with the necessary furniture and equipment.
	* Ví dụ: "The company furnished the new office with modern desks and chairs."
	* Từ liên quan: furnish, equipped, decorated, arranged...

Note: Although "furniture" can be used as a verb, it is less common than its noun form.

giải nghĩa từ "furniture" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Furniture (n) - Đồ nội thất

    • Furniture refers to movable objects intended to provide comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal in a home, office, or other space.
    • Ví dụ: "The furniture in the living room was modern and stylish."
    • Từ liên quan: chair, table, bed, sofa, desk, cabinet...

  2. Furniture (v) - Trang bị đồ nội thất

    • To furnish a room or building means to provide it with the necessary furniture and equipment.
    • Ví dụ: "The company furnished the new office with modern desks and chairs."
    • Từ liên quan: furnish, equipped, decorated, arranged...

Note: Although "furniture" can be used as a verb, it is less common than its noun form.
